post.description: Exports are generated asynchronously within SlideRoom.  To retrieve the export file generated by this request, use the api/v#/export/{token} endpoint to check the progress/result of the generation process.

parameters.description: The format of the application to export
parameters.name: format

parameters.description: Selects which evaluation round(s) should be used in the result.  Current: use evaluations from the program's current round.  Assigned: use evaluations from the round the application is currently assigned, Named: use evaluations from a specific round.  All: include all evaluation rounds (not applicable on tabular exports).
parameters.name: roundType

parameters.description: The round used to filter the data when roundtype is "Named"
parameters.name: roundName

parameters.description: The title of the custom export defined within SlideRoom to use when generating a tabular export.  This value is REQUIRED when choosing any tabular format.
parameters.name: tab.export

parameters.description: Should the export include form answers
parameters.name: pdf.includeForms

parameters.description: Should the export include references
parameters.name: pdf.includeReferences

parameters.description: Should the export include a list of media uploaded by the applicant
parameters.name: pdf.includeMedia

parameters.description: Should the export include attachments provided by the applicant
parameters.name: pdf.includeApplicantAttachments

parameters.description: Should the export include attachments provided by the organization
parameters.name: pdf.includeOrganizationAttachments

parameters.description: Should the export include reviewer ratings
parameters.name: pdf.includeRatings

parameters.description: Should the export include full-page versions of images uploaded by the applicant
parameters.name: pdf.includeFullPageMedia

parameters.description: Should the export include reviewer highlights
parameters.name: pdf.includeHighlights

parameters.description: Should the export include comments from reviewers
parameters.name: pdf.includeComments

parameters.description: Should the export include data from the Common Application
parameters.name: pdf.includeCommonApp

parameters.description: Should the export include the original media uploaded by the applicant
parameters.name: zip.originalMedia

parameters.description: Should the export include form answers
parameters.name: zip.includeForms

parameters.description: Should the export include references
parameters.name: zip.includeReferences

parameters.description: Should the export include a list of media uploaded by the applicant
parameters.name: zip.includeMedia

parameters.description: Should the export include attachments provided by the applicant
parameters.name: zip.includeApplicantAttachments

parameters.description: Should the export include attachments provided by the organization
parameters.name: zip.includeOrganizationAttachments

parameters.description: Should the export include reviewer ratings
parameters.name: zip.includeRatings

parameters.description: Should the export include comments from reviewers
parameters.name: zip.includeComments

parameters.description: Should the export include data from the Common Application
parameters.name: zip.includeCommonApp

parameters.description: Optionally specifies the pre-configured name of an external storage account (such as Dropbox) to deliver the export.
parameters.name: delivery.account

parameters.description: Optionally specifies the subfolder in which to deliver the export when using an external storage account.
parameters.name: delivery.folder

parameters.description: Limit result to applications submitted after the "since" date. Format as the number of seconds since 1/1/1970 GMT.
parameters.name: since

parameters.description: The application pool to be searched
parameters.name: pool

parameters.description: Filter the search to only include applications with this status.
parameters.name: status

parameters.description: The named of the saved search to use to define the export list. Required.
parameters.name: searchName

parameters.description: The email address of a user within SlideRoom to use when "scoping" data.  This will limit the result set to applications the user is permitted to see, as well as drive the "My Rating" search criteria.
parameters.name: email

post.summary: Requests the generation of application export files (tabular, pdf, zip).

post.description: Exports are generated asynchronously within SlideRoom.  To retrieve the export file generated by this request, use the api/v#/export/{token} endpoint to check the progress/result of the generation process.

post.summary: Requests the generation of a single application export file (tabular, pdf, zip).

get.summary: Gets the status/result of a requested export.
